<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_28"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="624" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	m
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Meters.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	m
<SUP>
	2
</SUP>
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Square meters.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	m
<SUP>
	3
</SUP>
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Cubic meters.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	masl
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Meters above sea level.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	mm
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Millimeters.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	micron
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	0.000001 meters.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	mill
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A plant where ore is crushed and ground to expose metals or minerals of economic value, which then undergo physical and/or chemical treatment to extract the valuable metals or minerals.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	mine
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	An excavation in the earth for the purpose of extracting minerals. The excavation may be an open pit on the surface or underground workings.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	mineral reserve
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	The part of a measured or indicated mineral resource that could be economically mined, demonstrated by at least a preliminary feasibility study that includes adequate information on mining, processing, metallurgical, economic and other relevant factors that demonstrate (at the time of reporting) that economic extraction can be justified. A mineral reserve includes diluting materials and allowances for losses that may occur when the material is mined.
	Mineral reserves are those parts of mineral resources that, after applying all mining factors, result in an estimated tonnage and grade that, in the opinion of the qualified person(s) making the estimates, is the basis of an economically viable project after taking account of all relevant processing, metallurgical, economic, marketing, legal, environment, socio-economic and government factors. The term &ldquo;mineral reserve&rdquo; need not necessarily signify that
	extraction facilities are in place or operative or that all governmental approvals have been received, although it does signify that there are reasonable expectations of such approvals. Mineral reserves are subdivided into proven mineral reserves and probable mineral reserves. Mineral reserves fall under the following categories:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	proven mineral reserves
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	That part of a measured mineral resource that is economically mineable, demonstrated by at least a preliminary feasibility study that includes adequate information on mining, processing, metallurgical, economic and other relevant factors that demonstrate (at the time of reporting) that economic extraction is justified.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	probable mineral reserves
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	That part of an indicated (and in some circumstances a measured) mineral resource that is economically mineable, demonstrated by at least a preliminary feasibility study that includes adequate information on mining, processing, metallurgical, economic and other relevant factors that demonstrate (at the time of reporting) that economic extraction can be justified.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	mineral resource
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A concentration or occurrence of natural, solid, inorganic or fossilized organic material in or on the earth&rsquo;s crust in such form and quantity and of such a grade or quality that it has reasonable prospects for economic extraction. The location, quantity, grade, geological characteristics and continuity of a mineral resource are known, estimated or interpreted from specific geological evidence and knowledge. Mineral resources fall under the
	following categories:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	measured mineral resource
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	That part of a mineral resource for which quantity, grade or quality, densities, shape and physical characteristics are so well established that they can be estimated with confidence sufficient to allow the appropriate application of technical and economic parameters to support production planning and evaluation of the economic viability of the deposit. The estimate is based on detailed and reliable exploration, sampling and testing information gathered
	through appropriate techniques from locations such as outcrops, trenches, pits, workings and drill holes that are spaced closely enough to confirm both geological and grade continuity.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	indicated mineral resource
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	That part of a mineral resource for which quantity, grade or quality, densities, shape and physical characteristics can be estimated with a level of confidence sufficient to allow the appropriate application of technical and economic parameters to support mine planning and evaluate the economic viability of the deposit. The estimate is based on detailed and reliable exploration and testing information gathered through appropriate techniques from
	locations such as outcrops, trenches, pits, workings and drill holes that are spaced closely enough for geological and grade continuity to be reasonably assumed.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	inferred mineral resource
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;

<DIV TITLE="EE+ PAGE BREAK" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PT; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 1PX">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage95"></A>
<DIV TITLE="EE+ PAGE HEADER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 3PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	- 81 -
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_29"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="624" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	That part of a mineral resource for which quantity and grade or quality can be estimated on the basis of geological evidence, limited sampling and reasonably assumed (but not verified) geological and grade continuity. The estimate is based on limited information and sampling gathered through appropriate techniques from locations such as outcrops, trenches, pits, workings and drill holes.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	mineralization
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Rock containing minerals or metals of potential economic interest.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	metallurgy
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	The science of extracting metals from ores by mechanical and chemical processes and preparing them for use.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	monzonite
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A coarse-grained igneous rock containing less than 10 percent quartz.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Mt
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Million tonnes
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	open pit mine
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	An excavation for removing minerals that is open to the surface.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	ounce (or oz)
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Troy ounce, equal to 31.103 grams.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	ore
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A natural aggregate of one or more minerals that, at a specified time and place, may be mined and sold at a profit, or from which some part may be profitably separated.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	oxide ore
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Mineralized rock in which some of the original minerals, usually sulphide, have been oxidized. Oxidation tends to make the ore more porous and permits a more complete permeation of cyanide solutions so that minute particles of gold in the interior of the minerals will be readily dissolved.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	oz/t
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Troy ounces per short ton.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Paleozoic
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Unit of geologic time spanning from 570 to 245 million years ago.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	phyllite
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A metamorphic rock containing fine-grained, planar-oriented mica minerals. This orientation imparts a layering to the rock.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	plagiogranite
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A light-coloured, crystalline intrusive igneous rock, composed of sodium and calcium bearing alumino-silicate minerals and quartz (SiO
<SUB>
	2
</SUB>
	).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	porphyritic
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Texture of an igneous rock in which larger crystals are set in a finer groundmass.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	potassic
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	An alteration type characterized by the pressure of quartz, potassium, feldspar and biotite.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Proterozoic
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Unit of geologic time spanning from 2,500 to 570 million years ago.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	ramp
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	An inclined underground tunnel that provides access for mining or a connection between the levels of a mine.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	RC
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Reverse circulation.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	recovery
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A term, generally stated as a percentage, used in process metallurgy to indicate the proportion of valuable material obtained in the processing of an ore.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	refractory material
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Gold mineralized material in which the gold is not amenable to recovery by conventional cyanidation without any pre-treatment. The refractory nature can be either silica or sulphide encapsulation of the gold or the presence of naturally occurring carbon, which reduces gold recovery.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	roasting
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A method of oxidizing refractory ore using heat.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	roasting agglomerates
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A product of the roasting process.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	ROM
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Run of mine. Pertains to the ore that has been mined but not crushed.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	run of mine
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Pertains to the ore that has been mined but not crushed.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	SAG
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Semi-autogenous grinding. A method of grinding rock into fine powder whereby the grinding media consist of larger chunks of rocks and steel balls.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	scrubber
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A device that removes SO
<SUB>
	2
</SUB>
	from gaseous emissions.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	shaft
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A vertical or sub-vertical passageway to an underground mine for moving personnel, equipment, supplies and material, including ore and waste rock.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	short ton
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Equal to 2,000 pounds, equivalent to 0.893 long tonnes or 907.185 kilograms.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	shrinkage stoping
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A method of stoping that uses part of the broken ore as a working platform and as support for the walls.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	sills
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A tabular intrusive igneous rock that parallels the planar structure of the surrounding rock.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	sinistral faults
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Faults whose apparent direction of relative movement to each side is towards the left.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	SO
<SUB>
	2
</SUB>
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Sulphur dioxide gas.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

</FONT>

</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">

<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Ore containing a significant quantity of unoxidized sulphides.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">
<P>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	tailings
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	The material that remains after all metals or minerals of economic interest have been removed from ore during milling.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">

	A metric tonne: 1,000 kilograms or 2,204.6 pounds.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	Barren rock in a mine, or mineralized material that is too low in grade to be mined and milled at a profit.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">

<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A vertical or inclined shaft sunk from a point inside a mine.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="157">

<FONT SIZE="1">
	Zadra methods
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.05IN; PADDING-TOP: 0.05IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="467">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	A chemical process whereby gold in solution is collected on carbon particles.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	SCHEDULE A
</FONT>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	ELDORADO GOLD CORPORATION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 3PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(&ldquo;Eldorado or the Company&rdquo;)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	AUDIT COMMITTEE
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Terms of Reference
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="104" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	I.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="56">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	ROLE
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The role of the Audit Committee (the &ldquo;Committee&rdquo;) is to ensure that management of the Company (the &ldquo;Management&rdquo;) has in place an effective system of internal financial controls for reviewing and reporting on the Company&rsquo;s financial statements; to monitor the independence and performance of the Company&rsquo;s external auditor (the &ldquo;Auditor&rdquo;); to oversee the
	integrity of the Company&rsquo;s financial disclosure and reporting and to monitor Management&rsquo;s compliance with legal and regulatory requirements; and to report on the Committee&rsquo;s activities on a regular and timely basis to the Board of Directors (the &ldquo;Board&rdquo;).
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="179" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	II
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="131">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	RESPONSIBILITY
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Committee will have the following duties and responsibilities:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="51">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="52">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Review with the Auditor and with the Management of the Company prior to the recommendation of the approval of the consolidated financial statements of the Company by the Board:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	the audited annual and unaudited quarterly financial statements including the notes thereto;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	the appropriateness of the Management Discussion and Analysis (MD&amp;A) of operations contained in the audited annual and unaudited quarterly report and their consistency with the financial statements;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	any report or opinion proposed to be rendered in connection with the financial statements, including independent expert reports;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	any significant transactions which are not a normal part of the Company&rsquo;s business;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	the nature and substance of significant accruals, accounting, reserves and other estimates having a material effect on the financial statements;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	carrying values of financial assets and liabilities, including key assumptions and practices used to determine fair value accounting and related mark-to-market adjustments;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	any off balance sheet financing arrangement;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	issues regarding accounting and auditing principles and practices as well as the adequacy of internal controls, including a discussion of the responsibilities of the Company&rsquo;s internal audit function;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	any significant transactions with or involving an unconsolidated affiliate;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

	all significant adjustments proposed by Management or by the Auditor;
</FONT>

</FONT>

	any impairment provisions based on ceiling test calculations; and including the carrying value of Goodwill;
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="128">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Independently and periodically review the adequacy of procedures in place for the review of public disclosure of financial information as stated or derived from the financial statements;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	review financial statements and MD&amp;A and annual and interim earning disclosure before they are released to the public; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">

	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>

	review with members of the Board proficient in the technical aspects of preparing a mineral reserve and resource calculation the mineral reserve calculation procedure and the credentials of the qualified person.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Establish a complaint process and &ldquo;whistle-blowing&rdquo; procedures. Establish procedures for the receipt, retention, and treatment of any complaints regarding accounting, internal accounting controls, or audit related matters. Establish procedures for employees&rsquo; confidential, anonymous submissions in accordance with the Company&rsquo;s
	&ldquo;Whistle Blower Policy&rdquo;.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	(xi)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Advise the Board with respect to the Company&rsquo;s policies and procedures regarding compliance with new developments in generally accepted accounting principles, laws and regulations and their impact on the consolidated financial statements of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(xii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Review with Management and the Auditor, the Company&rsquo;s internal accounting and financial systems and controls to assess that the Company maintains and reports on:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="120">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	the appropriate books, records and accounts in reasonable detail to accurately and fairly reflect the Company&rsquo;s transactions;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	effective internal control systems; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">

<FONT FACE="WINGDINGS">
	&Oslash;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	adequate processes for assessing the risk of material misstatement of the financial statements and for detecting control weaknesses or fraud.
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

	Assess the Committee&rsquo;s performance of the duties specified in this Terms of Reference and report its finding to the Board.

<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="163" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	III
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="115">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	COMPOSITION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="51">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Board will appoint Directors to form the Committee annually at the Board Meeting following the Annual Shareholders Meeting.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 11PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="47">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Board has determined that the Committee will be comprised of at least three Independent Directors (the &ldquo;Member&rdquo; or &ldquo;Members&rdquo;) all of whom shall be financially literate. The Board may remove or replace a Member at any time. A Member will serve on the Committee until the termination of the appointment or until a successor is
	appointed,
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	All Members will meet the &ldquo;independence and financial literacy&rdquo; qualifications under applicable securities laws and at least one Member shall meet the definition of a &ldquo;financial expert&rdquo; as defined by the United States Securities &amp; Exchange Commission.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Board will appoint the Chairman of the Committee. The Corporate Secretary of the Company will keep minutes of each meeting.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="137" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	IV.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 0.25IN" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="89">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	MEETINGS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="51">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="45">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Meetings of the Committee will be held at the request of a Member, the Chief Executive Officer, the Corporate Secretary or the Auditor of the Company at such times and places as may be determined, but in any event at least to review the Company&rsquo;s quarterly and annual financial disclosure. Twenty-four (24) hours advance notice of each meeting given
	orally, by telephone, or in writing delivered by facsimile or electronic mail together with an agenda will be given to each Member unless all Members are present and waive notice and any absent waive notice in writing.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="51">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="45">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	A majority of Members will constitute a quorum. Decisions of the Committee will be by an affirmative vote of the majority of those Members voting at a meeting. Powers of the Committee may also be exercised by resolution in writing signed by all the Members.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Committee will have access to the Auditor and Management of the Company, exclusive of each other, for purposes of performing its duties. The Committee will meet with the Auditor independent of Management after each review of unaudited and audited statements.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0IN; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 0IN" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Auditor will be notified of meetings of the Committee and will attend if requested to do so by a Member or by Management.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="115" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	V
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 12PT; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP" NOWRAP WIDTH="67">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	OTHER
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage100"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 11PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Committee as whole or each Member individually are able to engage outside advisors at the Company&rsquo;s expense that they determine is necessary in order to assist in fulfilling their respective responsibilities. The engagement and payment by the Company for the services of an outside advisor is subject to approval by the Chairman of the Audit
	Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 11PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 1IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="48">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 11PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Committee will be provided funding by the Company for compensation of the Auditor.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	EXHIBIT 99.4
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	I, Paul N. Wright, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;40-F of Eldorado Gold Corporation;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the issuer as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	4.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The issuer&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the issuer and have:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the issuer, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
	prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting
	principles;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the issuer&rsquo;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	d)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the issuer&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the issuer&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	5.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The issuer&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the issuer&rsquo;s auditor and the audit committee of the issuer&rsquo;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the issuer&rsquo;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the issuer&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 5PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	I, Ed Miu, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">

<FONT SIZE="2">
	1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;40-F of Eldorado Gold Corporation;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the issuer as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

<FONT SIZE="2">
	4.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">

<FONT SIZE="2">
	The issuer&rsquo;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the issuer and have:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
