<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="24">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the issuer, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
	prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

	principles;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">

</P>
</TD>

<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 6PT; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the issuer&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">

<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_99_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	EXHIBIT 99.6
</FONT>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	18 U.S.C. &sect;1350,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	In connection with the Annual Report of Eldorado Gold Corporation (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;) on Form 40-F for the period ended December 31, 2009 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &ldquo;Report&rdquo;), I, Paul N. Wright, Chief Executive Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &sect;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley
	Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0.48IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0.48IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The information contained in this Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="381" BORDER="0">

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	EXHIBIT 99.7
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	18 U.S.C. &sect;1350,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	In connection with the Annual Report of Eldorado Gold Corporation (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;) on Form 40-F/A for the period ended December 31, 2009 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &ldquo;Report&rdquo;), I, Ed Miu, Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &sect;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of
	2002, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0.48IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0.48IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The information contained in this Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<STRONG>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	EXHIBIT 99.8
</FONT>
</STRONG>
<BR>
</P>
<P TITLE="EE+ PAGE HEADER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
</P>
<DIV TITLE="EE+ PAGE HEADER" ALIGN="LEFT">
<IMG HEIGHT="183" SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2010/03/31/0000912282-10-000446_KPMG_LOGO.JPG" WIDTH="746">
</DIV>
<P TITLE="EE+ PAGE HEADER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P TITLE="EE+ PAGE HEADER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P TITLE="EE+ PAGE HEADER" STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	To the Board of Directors of Eldorado Gold Corporation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	We consent to the inclusion in this annual report on Form 40-F of:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="16">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="28">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 116.64%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="4">
<B>
	&bull;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 116.64%; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	our Report of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm dated March 17, 2010 on the consolidated balance sheets of Eldorado Gold Corporation (&ldquo;the Company&rdquo;) as at December 31, 2009, and the consolidated statements of operations and deficit, cash flows, and comprehensive income for the year ended December 31, 2009;
	and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="16">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="28">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 116.64%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="4">
<B>
	&bull;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-RIGHT: 0IN; PADDING-LEFT: 0IN; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0IN; PADDING-TOP: 6PT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; LINE-HEIGHT: 116.64%; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	our Report of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm dated March 17, 2010 on the Company&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting as of December 31, 2009
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	each of which is incorporated by reference in this annual report on Form 40-F of the Company for the year ended December 31, 2009. Our report dated March 17, 2010, on the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting as of December 31, 2009, contains an explanatory paragraph that states that management has excluded Sino Gold Mining Limited&rsquo;s internal controls over financial reporting from
	its assessment of the effectiveness of the Company&rsquo;s internal controls over financial reporting as of December 31, 2009.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	We also consent to the incorporation by reference of our reports in the Company&rsquo;s Form S-8 Registration Statement (SEC File No. 333-160349).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	KPMG LLP (signed)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Chartered Accountants
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Vancouver, Canada
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	March 31, 2010
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
